thread.title: Selena Gomez and The Weeknd enjoy romantic date in Paris
thread.title_full: Selena Gomez and The Weeknd enjoy romantic date in Paris | Daily Mail Online

author: Dailymail.com Reporter
title: Selena Gomez and The Weeknd enjoy romantic date in Paris
text:
They're love is still going strong.
And Selena Gomez , 24, was spotted partying it up in Paris with her singer boyfriend The Weeknd, 27, on Monday night.
The two were seen leaving drinks at La Reserve in Paris and getting into a black car after touching down for fashion week that start on Tuesday.
Love in Paris! Selena Gomez, 24, was spotted partying it up in Paris with her singer boyfriend The Weeknd, 27, on Monday night
Awkward! The Weeknd's ex-girlfriend Bella Hadid was also spotted just blocks away at the George V Hotel in the city of lights
The Weeknd's ex-girlfriend Bella Hadid was also spotted just blocks away at the George V Hotel in the city of lights.
Selena and The Weeknd looked like Bella was the last thing on their mind as they stuck close to each other while leaving the hotel.
Selena looked chic and Parisian in a sleeveless black turtle neck sweater and her hair tied back into a low ponytail.
The Weeknd, whose real name is Abel Tesfaye, kept things casual in a light-colored jacket and black baseball cap that he wore over his perfectly cropped hair.
Ready for the city of lights: Selena looked chic and Parisian in a sleeveless black turtle neck sweater and her hair tied back into a low ponytail
Casual: The Weeknd, whose real name is Abel Tesfaye, kept things casual in a light-colored jacket and black baseball cap that he wore over his perfectly cropped hair
The two have been spotted out lately, cuddling close and being very affectionate, at various places in Los Angeles since mid-January.
According to US Weekly , the brunette beauty landed in Amsterdam just twenty four hours before her beau was scheduled to perform in the capital as part of his Starboy: Legend of the Fall Tour.
A source said Selena had went over to the Netherlands to watch him perform at the Ziggo Dome in the capital - and to support him during the European leg of his tour.
The insider explained to the site: 'She flew there to meet up with him. She will be at his show in Amsterdam.'
Doting girlfriend: A source said Selena had went over to the Netherlands to watch him perform at the Ziggo Dome in the capital - and to support him during the European leg of his tour
However with such a busy schedule of her own in both her music and TV career, the source added that her visits will only be fleeting, but it appears the two made time to head over to Paris just days later.
After his show in the Netherlands, the musician is set to journey on to Switzerland, France, Germany, Belgium and the UK, before embarking on a string of performances in North and South America - where he will be closer to his girl.
Selena and The Weeknd were first spotted as a couple in early 2017 when they went to dinner at Giorgio Baldi in Santa Monica.
The pair have since teased at the romance on their social media, and were even seen enjoying an intimate getaway to Italy together.
Meanwhile, also in Paris, Bella Hadid looked like she was ready for revenge in a bright red coat the appeared to cover her entire outfit and showed off her impressively long legs.
Meanwhile, also in Paris, Bella Hadid looked like she was ready for revenge in a bright red coat the appeared to cover her entire outfit and showed off her impressively long legs
Oozing sixties mod vibes, she highlighted her elongated her legs with her sizzling leather over-the-knee black boots.
The raven-haired beauty accessorised her chic ensemble with a patent leather mini tote in her manicured hand, while displayed her 'D' shaped earring.
Adding to her beauty look, she worked a shimmering shadow across her lids while keeping her glossy mane in a straight style, covered by her fashionable beret.
Busy: After his show in the Netherlands, the musician is set to journey on to Switzerland, France, Germany, Belgium and the UK, before embarking on a string of performances in North and South America - where he will be closer to his girl
Going strong: The pair have since teased at the romance on their social media, and were even seen enjoying an intimate getaway to Italy together
